game.title: A Knight's Quest
game.objective: Defeat the dragon and rescue the princess.
game.description: The evil dragon, Smaug, has kidnapped the princess and is holding her captive in his lair. You must slay the dragon and rescue the princess before it is too late.
game.reward: The princess's hand in marriage, a knighthood, and a castle.

task.description: The Dragon's Lair is located in the mountains to the north. You will need to navigate a treacherous forest and cross a mountain pass.
Smaug requires a powerful weapon and strategic thinking. Conquer his lair.
Discover and rescue the princess in one of Smaug's chambers.
Deliver the good news to King Arthur at his castle.
